cells.data:
-- take :: Int -> [a] -> [a]
on take(n, xs)
    if class of xs is string then
        if n > 0 then
            text 1 thru min(n, length of xs) of xs
        else
            ""
        end if
    else
        if n > 0 then
            items 1 thru min(n, length of xs) of xs
        else
            {}
        end if
    end if
end take
